description: Mana bullets made by compressing magic power. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Greatly reduces the movement speed of the person it hits for a certain period of time. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Draws the hit person closer to you. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Pushes the hit person farther away. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Summons two vines around the person hit. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
The hit person temporarily becomes the player's side. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
The existence of the hit person is banished. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Restores 30~60 HP to the person hit. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Warps to the point where it hits or near the target it hits. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
A straight laser is shot to the target point, dealing 20 heat damage to everything it hits. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
If it hits the ground, glass is scattered at the target point. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
If it hits the ground, a mine will be placed at the target location. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Turns monster with less than 200 HP that are hit into cow. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Turns monster with less than 300 HP that are hit into bear. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
Turns monster with less than 120 HP that are hit into chicken. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
The person hit is stunned for a short while. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Mana bullets made by compressing magic power.
The person hit is blinded for a short while. It is mainly ammunition for mana turrets, mana robots and mana guns.

Unlike ordinary arrows, metal arrows of lightning are magically imbued with lightning energy. This causes a lightning strike to the enemy when the arrow hits, inflicting more damage than a normal arrow.
These are magically created cannonballs to be loaded into a cannon. Cause a large explosion at the point where the bullet hits.
//: 4 pound cannonball weighs 28000 grains,shot at 1215 ft/s by a 3in ordnance rifle, equals 124459 joules of muzzle energy according to Shooters Calculator, round down from square root 352.78
//2: Recoil currently copied from 50 bmg ball as game_balance.md does not state a method for calculating recoil

description: This is a magic bomb that uses mana. After equipping this item, pull out the pin. After five seconds, it will start spitting out spider webs.

use_action.msg: You arm the spider web canister.

description: This is a bomb made of magic.  Use this item to arm it.  In ten seconds it will begin to expel fire extinguish gas.

use_action.msg: You arm the extinguisher bomb canister.

description: This Magic-made canister of extinguish gas has been unsealed, and In 10 seconds it will begin to expel fire.  You should consider getting rid of it soon.

name: Clone of compressed cells.
description: It is a clone of you. Use this to make a clone that will follow you and support you in your life.
A magic wand that attacks by emitting a strong light on the target. The ammunition will fill up as time passes.
A sturdy wood bat.  Makes a great melee weapon.

description: This is an broken golem crystal.You can repair it from the Craft menu.

name: Great Blessing
description: You got great blessing and covered by protect aura that reduce all received damage by half and increase your HP,STAMINA and MANA by 20%. This aura also heal your hp every 10 minutes
Continuously summons blades of air that slices the target for a certain period of time.
A magic that attacks enemies in a range of 10 squares around it while moving randomly for a certain period of time. Each attack can inflict 100 bash damage.
This magic releases an aura that freezes the surface of the water in 3 surrounding tiles.
You continue to emit an aura that temporarily joins monsters with less than 80 HP around you.

name: Icicle Barrage
description: Continues to summon many ice thorns around it for a certain period of time. These ice thorns fly toward the surrounding enemies and deal piercing damage damage.

name: thunder storm
description: A thundercloud that unleashes lightning that deals 35 damage per second to monsters in the surrounding 15 tiles.

name: Orb of Master of Classic Zombies
description:
While held in the hand,
 every 3 minutes it will release a pulse that can mind-control the classic zombies in the surrounding 10 tiles for 10 minutes,
Its pulse also increases the movement speed of all enemy and friendly zombies by 30.
---CLASSIC ZOMBIES---
・zombie
・scarred zombie
・zombie cop
・crawling zombie
・fat zombie
・firefighter zombie
・hazmat zombie
・decayed zombie
・SWAT zombie
・tough zombie

name: Fire Shield
description: Aura of fire that protects from the harmful environment for one hour and sets the attacker on fire.
A mass of cleansed water with super strong disinfectant properties that can be used to instantly disinfect wounds.
